document.full_text: a pair of power-play goals gave new jersey its fifth win in six games. the devils are 21-3-2 since jan. 8 and still hoping for a playoff berth after a terrible start.
document.title: n.h.l. roundup: devils defeat thrashers in overtime to keep hopes alive
lines_and_colors: a pair of power-play goals gave new jersey its fifth win in six games. the devils are 21-3-2 since jan. 8 and still hoping for a playoff berth after a terrible start.
